dict.acceptation: 卖，售；使好卖；使接受，使赞成；销售；

sent.orig: Compare sell, vend, peddle, push and flog.
sent.trans: 试比较sell、 vend、 peddle、 push、 flog这几个词。

sent.orig: The product is just part of what we sell. We also sell our brand and warranty.
sent.trans: 产品只是我们销售内容的一部分，我们还销售我们的品牌和产品保证。

sent.orig: We sell our sweat; our women sell their bodies. I know, I know it all!
sent.trans: 咱们卖汗，咱们的女人卖肉，我明白，我知道！

sent.orig: Sell condom alone or sell newspaper alone, namely monomer machine alone.
sent.trans: 单独售套或单独售报，即单体机。

sent.orig: Adapt it, sell it, improve it and sell it again, hopefully all within the same week.
sent.trans: 先改变、后销售、再改进和再销售，每一周都充满了新的希望。
